mapper.insert:

ID,
ACCOUNT_ID,
INCOME_LOG_TYPE,
INCOME_BEFORE_CHANGED,
CHANGED_INCOME,
INCOME_AFTER_CHANGED,
CHANGED_TITILE,

MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP,

mapper.update:
update PNT_INCOME_LOG
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
INCOME_LOG_TYPE = #{incomeLogType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
INCOME_BEFORE_CHANGED = #{incomeBeforeChanged,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHANGED_INCOME = #{changedIncome,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INCOME_AFTER_CHANGED = #{incomeAfterChanged,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHANGED_TITILE = #{changedTitile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAT_DATE = #{statDate,jdbcType=DATE},
MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP = #{modifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update PNT_INCOME_LOG set ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, INCOME_LOG_TYPE = #{incomeLogType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, INCOME_BEFORE_CHANGED = #{incomeBeforeChanged,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHANGED_INCOME = #{changedIncome,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INCOME_AFTER_CHANGED = #{incomeAfterChanged,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHANGED_TITILE = #{changedTitile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAT_DATE = #{statDate,jdbcType=DATE}, MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP = #{modifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, ACCOUNT_ID, INCOME_LOG_TYPE, INCOME_BEFORE_CHANGED, CHANGED_INCOME, INCOME_AFTER_CHANGED, CHANGED_TITILE, STAT_DATE, MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP from PNT_INCOME_LOG
SELECT CHANGED_INCOME AS changeIncomeTotal FROM pnt.PNT_INCOME_LOG WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND STAT_DATE = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND INCOME_LOG_TYPE = 1;
